input.query:
Please create calendar events for the split coding sessions for the Charon file writing tool implementation:
1. Saturday, August 16: 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM - "Charon File Writing Tool - Core Implementation" 
2. Sunday, August 17: 11:00 AM - 1:30 PM - "Charon File Writing Tool - Testing & Refinement"

Also schedule "The Midnight Library" reading sessions right after each coding session:
1. Saturday, August 16: 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM - "Relaxation: The Midnight Library Reading"
2. Sunday, August 17: 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM - "Relaxation: The Midnight Library Reading"
